docs.snippet: As those headed to Rio come up with plans to battle the mosquito-borne virus, John Speraw, an American volleyball coach, is preserving sperm in case he is infected....
docs.lead_paragraph: As those headed to Rio come up with plans to battle the mosquito-borne virus, John Speraw, an American volleyball coach, is preserving sperm in case he is infected.
docs.abstract: Concerns about Zika virus lead athletes and coaches attending 2016 Rio Olympics to adopt array of precautions, including freezing sperm; fewer guests and spectators, especially pregnant women, are expected to make trip.

headline.main: Among Olympians’ Zika Precautions: Fewer Guests, Frozen Sperm
headline.print_headline: Among Zika Precautions: Fewer Guests, Frozen Sperm
